tool_description: An API showing all the latest Climate Change News around the World
name: Climate Change in the Worlds
title: Climate Change in the Worlds

api_list.name: Get individual News source
api_list.description: Gets News about climate Change from a specific news ressource (thetimes, guardian,...)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-in-the-worlds.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-in-the-worlds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-in-the-worlds.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-in-the-worlds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change news
api_list.description: Get news on climate change around the world
